title: Bug 37021: Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021: Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files in [java|aj]. Refer to tests/new/binaryWarnings/ for code to reproduce the issue. Note that the tests may have false positives due to filename checking limitations in harness verification of messages. (AJDT may omit the filename if it does not make sense to AJDT.)
OB: The source path is shown as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main' in declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars.
EB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the sourcepath should be displayed as 'app/Main' instead of 'app.Main.class'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Run the code from tests/new/binaryWarnings/.
2. Check the declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars.
